body_text: Turns out connected components have a WrappedComponent attribute with the unconnected version of the component, so we don't need this naming convention to get around that anymore.
body: Turns out connected components have a `WrappedComponent` attribute with the unconnected version of the component, so we don't need this naming convention to get around that anymore.
